entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %

Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
